markups.originaltext: Since the general-izability of deep neural networks is difficult to control, ex-isting models such as autoencoder do not work well.

textblocks.text:
Since the general-
izability of deep neural networks is difficult to control, ex-
isting models such as autoencoder do not work well.

markups.originaltext: It is generally assumed [57, 17, 55] that the re-construction error of the normal samples which are similarto the training data will be lower than abnormal samples.

construction error of the normal samples which are similar
to the training data will be lower than abnormal samples.
